item.title: Topsy
item.description: I have a fascination with Elephants. One of the goals of the daily writing practice is to contribute towards a biography of famous elephants.⊕ I think it might take a while before I get to that point, so Iâ€™ll probably revisit the stories of different elephants a fair bit on the way. This piece is really intended to be a very very brief introduction to Topsy This came about after reading about Topsy.
